node.title: Kamaru Usman is still the 170-pound U.F.C. champion.
node.alt: Kamaru Usman lands a punch against Colby Covington during their welterweight bout.
node.description: He beat Colby Covington in a decision carried by two knockdowns in the second round.
node.content: ["Kamaru Usman defended his welterweight championship, defeating his rival Colby Covington by unanimous decision.", "Usman dropped Covington twice in the second round, nearly finishing him. But Covington recovered and was competitive for the rest of the fight, keeping a high pace, pinning Usman to the fence and also landing solid punches and a head kick. One could argue that it could have been a split decision. Still, Usman connected on his attacks, too, and defended takedowns effectively. He performed at a high enough level to prevent the judges from taking away his belt.", "In the end, the two rivals shook hands, a gesture that some would have not predicted after a year of trash talk and insults. Usman has now defended his title five times and is marching closer to potentially usurping Georges St-Pierre as the greatest welterweight of all time. He said earlier this week that he would like to face Sa\u00fal \u00c1lvarez in a crossover boxing match."]
